inputChannel.description: Please mention a channel or input a channel's name.

inputRole.description: Please mention a role or input a role's name.

blacklistClearConfirmation.description: Are you sure you want to clear __**{{TOTAL}}**__ blacklisted user(s)?

trustedRoleClearConfirmation.description: Are you sure you want to clear __**{{TOTAL}}**__ trusted role(s)?

memberAnniversaryRoleClearConfirmation.description: Are you sure you want to clear __**{{TOTAL}}**__ member anniversary role(s)?

requiredSetupBirthdayChannel.title: Server Setup - Birthday Channel
description: For help, view the required setup guide [here]({{REF:docLinks.setupRequiredGuide}})!
To begin you must set up the birthday channel [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsBirthdayChannel}})
Please select an option

requiredSetupBirthdayRole.title: Server Setup - Birthday Role
description: Now, set up the birthday role [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsBirthdayRole}})
Note: The Birthday Role is actively removed from those whose birthday it isn't.
Please select an option

trustedSetupPreventsMessage.title: Trusted Setup - Trusted Prevents Message
description: Should the trusted role prevent the birthday message? [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.trustedPreventsMessage)
True: {{REF:emotes.confirm}}
False: {{REF:emotes.deny}}

trustedSetupPreventsRole.title: Trusted Setup - Trusted Prevents Role
description: Should the trusted role prevent the birthday role? [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.trustedPreventsRole}})
True: {{REF:emotes.confirm}}
False: {{REF:emotes.deny}}

trustedSetupRequireAll.title: Trusted Setup - Require All Trusted Roles
description: With premium you can set multiple trusted roles. Because of this, you can choose if a user needs one or all of the trusted roles to have their birthday celebrated.
Should birthdays require all trusted roles? [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.requireAllTrustedRoles}})
True: {{REF:emotes.confirm}}
False: {{REF:emotes.deny}}

anniversarySetupMemberChannel.title: Anniversary Setup - Member Anniversary Channel
description: For help, view the anniversary setup guide [here]({{REF:dockLinks.setupAnniversaryGuide}})!
To begin you must set up the member anniversary channel [(?)]({{REF:dockLinks.whatIsMemberAnniversaryChannel}})
Please select an option

anniversarySetupServerChannel.title: Anniversary Setup - Server Anniversary Channel
description: For help, view the anniversary setup guide [here]({{REF:dockLinks.setupAnniversaryGuide}})!
To begin you must set up the server anniversary channel [(?)]({{REF:dockLinks.whatIsServerAnniversaryChannel}})
Please select an option

customMessageColorSelection.title: Custom Message Color Selection
description: Please input the color you would like your message. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsMessageEmbedColor}})
Both color names and hex values are accepted.

customMessageEmbedSelection.title: Custom Message - Embedded
description: Should this message be embedded? [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsAnEmbed}})
Hint: This message is embed! Non-embedded messages are just plain text.
True {{REF:emotes.confirm}}
False {{REF:emotes.deny}}

confirmClearMessages.description: Are you sure you want to clear __**{{MESSAGE_COUNT}}**__ {{DISPLAY_TYPE}}?

birthdaySetupTimeZone.title: Time Zone Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: First, please type/paste your time zone below. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whyDoesItNeedMyTimezone}})
To find your time zone please use the [map time zone picker]({{REF:links.map}})!
Simply click your location on the map and copy the name of the selected time zone.
**Example Usage:** `America/New_York`
**Important**: By submitting this information you agree it can be shown to anyone.

birthdaySetupBirthday.title: Birthday Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: Please type your birth month and day below. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whyDoesItNeedOnlyMonthAndDate}})
**Example Usage:** `08/28` (MM/DD)
**Important**: By submitting this information you agree it can be shown to anyone.

birthdayConfirmPurge.title: Clear User Data
description: This command will remove both your time zone and your birthday from the database. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whyDoesItNeedMyTimezone}})
This will **NOT** reset your birthday attempts. (You have {{CHANGES_LEFT}} left) [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whyDoesItNeedOnlyMonthAndDate}})
Birthdays are stored globally not by server! This will erase your birthday for all servers!
{{APPEND}}

defaultTimeZoneAvailable.title: Time Zone Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: This server has a default timezone of **{{SERVER_TIMEZONE}}**. Do you want to use the server's timezone?

defaultTimeZoneAvailableOverride.title: Time Zone Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: This server has a default timezone of **{{SERVER_TIMEZONE}}**. Do you want to use **{{INPUTTED_TIMEZONE}}** instead?
Clicking {{REF:emotes.confirm}} will set your timezone to **{{INPUTTED_TIMEZONE}}**
Clicking {{REF:emotes.deny}} will set your timezone **{{SERVER_TIMEZONE}}**

inputPage.description: Please input the page you would like to jump to:

confirmFirstBirthday.description: {{TARGET}}, please confirm this information is correct: **{{BIRTHDAY}}, {{TIMEZONE}}**

footer.text: You have {{CHANGES_LEFT}} attempts left. By clicking confirm you will use one of them.

confirmFirstBirthdaySuggest.description: {{TARGET}}, please confirm this information is correct: **{{BIRTHDAY}}, {{TIMEZONE}}**

footer.text: {{TARGET_FOOTER}} has {{CHANGES_LEFT}} attempts left. By clicking confirm they will use one of them.

confirmChangeBirthday.description: {{TARGET}}, your birthday is already set, please confirm this information is correct to change it: **{{BIRTHDAY}}, {{TIMEZONE}}**

footer.text: You have {{CHANGES_LEFT}} attempts left. By clicking confirm you will use one of them.

confirmChangeBirthdaySuggest.description: {{TARGET}}, your birthday is already set, please confirm this information is correct to change it: **{{BIRTHDAY}}, {{TIMEZONE}}**

footer.text: {{TARGET_FOOTER}} has {{CHANGES_LEFT}} attempts left. By clicking confirm they will use one of them.

requiredSetup.title: Server Setup - Completed
description: You have successfully completed the required server setup!
**Birthday Channel**: {{CHANNEL}}
**Birthday Role**: {{ROLE}}

birthdayTest.title: Birthday Event Test
description: Below are the checks to ensure your settings are correct for the birthday event.

footer.text: This is the info from your birthday event test.

memberAnniversaryTest.title: Member Anniversary Event Test
description: Below are the checks to ensure your settings are correct for the member anniversary event.

serverAnniversaryTest.title: Birthday Event Test

trustedSetup.title: Trusted Setup - Completed
description: You have successfully completed the trusted server setup!
**Trusted Prevents Role**: {{PREVENTS_ROLE}}
**Trusted Prevents Role**: {{PREVENTS_MESSAGE}}

trustedSetupPremium.title: Trusted Setup - Completed
description: You have successfully completed the trusted server setup!
**Trusted Prevents Role**: {{PREVENTS_ROLE}}
**Trusted Prevents Role**: {{PREVENTS_MESSAGE}}
**Require All Trusted Roles**: {{REQUIRE_ALL_ROLES}}

anniversarySetup.title: Anniversary Setup - Completed
description: You have successfully completed the required server setup!
**Member Anniversary Channel**: {{MEMBER_CHANNEL}}
**Server Anniversary Channel**: {{SERVER_CHANNEL}}
Successfully set your birthday to **{{BIRTHDAY}}, {{TIMEZONE}}**
**Important Note:** Birthdays are stored globally. This means your birthday is now set for all servers with Birthday Bot!

footer.text: You now have {{AMOUNT}} birthday attempts left.

purgeSuccessful.description: Successfully purged your data from the database.

nextServerAnniversary.description: **{{SERVER}}**'s anniversary is on **{{DATE}}**. It will be turning **{{YEARS}}**!

memberAnniversaryRolesClaimed.description: Successfully claimed all member anniversary roles available to you/

footer.text: If some roles were not given Birthday Bot may not have permission to give them.

blacklistAddSuccess.description: Successfully removed {{TARGET}} from the birthday blacklist!

blacklistRemoveSuccess.description: Successfully added {{TARGET}} to the birthday blacklist!

masterRoleCreated.description: Successfully created the birthday master role {{ROLE}}!

masterRoleSet.description: Successfully set the birthday master role to {{ROLE}}!

masterRoleCleared.description: Successfully cleared the birthday master role!

birthdayRoleSet.description: Successfully set the birthday role to {{ROLE}}!

customMessagesCleared.description: Successfully cleared all {{DISPLAY_TYPE}} from the database!

birthdayChannelSet.description: Successfully set the birthday channel to {{CHANNEL}}

memberAnniversaryChannelCreated.description: Successfully created the member anniversary channel {{CHANNEL}}!

memberAnniversaryChannelCleared.description: Successfully cleared the member anniversary channel!

memberAnniversaryChannelSet.description: Successfully set the member anniversary channel to {{CHANNEL}}

serverAnniversaryChannelCreated.description: Successfully created the server anniversary channel {{CHANNEL}}!

serverAnniversaryChannelCleared.description: Successfully cleared the server anniversary channel!

serverAnniversaryChannelSet.description: Successfully set the server anniversary channel to {{CHANNEL}}

description: Successfully updated the server's name format setting to `{{SETTING}}`!
Names will now appear in this format: **{{FORMAT}}**
Successfully updated the server's date format setting to `{{SETTING}}`!
This is how birthdays will be detected in this server!

defaultTimeZoneSet.description: Successfully set your server's default timezone to **{{TIMEZONE}}**!

defaultTimeCleared.description: Successfully cleared your server's default timezone!

useTimeZoneSettingSet.description: Birthdays will now be celebrated based on the {{OPTION}}'s timezone!

addedTrustedRole.description: Successfully added {{ROLE}} as a trusted role!

addedMemberAnniversaryRole.description: Successfully added {{ROLE}} as a Year {{YEAR}} member anniversary reward!

clearedMemberAnniversaryRole.description: Successfully cleared the member anniversary roles!

removedMemberAnniversaryRole.description: Successfully removed the member anniversary role {{ROLE}}!

trustedPreventsMessageYes.description: Trusted Role is now required for the birthday message!

trustedPreventsMessageNo.description: Trusted Role is now not required for the birthday message!

trustedPreventsRoleYes.description: Trusted Role is now required for the birthday role!

trustedPreventsRoleNo.description: Trusted Role is now not required for the birthday role!

requireAllTrustedYes.description: To have their birthday celebrated users now require all the trusted roles!

requireAllTrustedNo.description: To have their birthday celebrated users now require only one of the trusted roles!

setMessageTime.description: Successfully set the {{DISPLAY_TYPE}} to send at **{{TIME}}**

footer.text: You currently have {{CHANGES_LEFT}} birthday attempt(s) left.

addCustomMessage.title: Add Custom Message
description: Successfully added the {{DISPLAY_TYPE}} message:
{{MESSAGE}}
{{HAS_PREMIUM}}
Embedded: `{{IS_EMBED}}`

addCustomUserMessage.title: Add Custom Message
description: Successfully added the user {{DISPLAY_TYPE}} message for {{USER}}:
{{MESSAGE}}
{{HAS_PREMIUM}}
Embedded: `{{IS_EMBED}}`

fields.name: Actions
value: `{{REF:bot.prefix}} message {{REF:types.list}} {{TYPE}} [page]` - List all custom user specific {{DISPLAY_TYPE}} messages.
`{{REF:bot.prefix}} message {{REF:types.test}} {{TYPE}} <position>` - Test a user specific {{DISPLAY_TYPE}} message.

voteRequired.title: Vote Required!
description: This command requires you to have voted in the past 24 hours!

footer.text: Don't want to vote? Disable voting for the whole server with {{REF:bot.name}} Premium!

notEnoughChannelPerms.title: Not Enough Permissions!
description: {{REF:bot.name}} needs more permissions in {{CHANNEL}}!
__Permissions Needed__
View Channel
Send Messages
Embed Links
Add Reactions
Note: These permissions are needed both in the server and in {{CHANNEL}}!

noPermToEdit.description: I do not have permission to edit that message!

setupRequired.title: Setup Required!
setupRequired.description: You must run `{{REF:bot.prefix}} setup` before using this command!

noPermission.title: Permission Required!
noPermission.description: You don't have permission to run that command!

onlyStaff.description: This command can only be run by {{REF:bot.name}} Staff!

guildOnlyCommand.description: This command can only be used in a discord server!

noArgs.title: Invalid Usage!
description: Please specify an option!
{{OPTIONS}}

invalidNextArgs.title: Invalid Usage!
description: Please specify which you would like to view!
Next options: `{{REF:types.birthday}}`, `{{REF:types.memberAnniversary}}` or `{{REF:types.serverAnniversary}}`

invalidListArgs.title: Invalid Usage!
description: Please specify which list you would like to view!
List options: `{{REF:types.birthday}}` or `{{REF:types.memberAnniversary}}`

invalidViewArgs.title: Invalid Usage!
description: Please specify which type you would like to view!
View options: `{{REF:types.birthday}}` or `{{REF:types.memberAnniversary}}`

invalidSetupArgs.title: Invalid Usage!
description: Please specify which setup you want to run!
Setup options: `anniversary` or `trusted`

serverTimezoneNotSet.description: This server doesn't have a default timezone set! The anniversary system requires one to be set!

viewUserInDm.description: You cannot request another user's information in a DM!

description: {{USER}} hasn't set their birthday!

noBlacklistArgs.title: Invalid Usage!
description: Please specify a sub command for the blacklist! [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsBirthdayBlacklist}})
Accepted Values: `{{REF:types.list}}`, `{{REF:types.add}} <User>`, `{{REF:types.remove}} <User>`, `{{REF:types.clear}}`

noTrustedRoleArgs.title: Invalid Usage!
description: Please specify a sub command! [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsTrustedRole}})
Accepted Values: `{{REF:types.add}}`, `{{REF:types.remove}}`, `{{REF:types.clear}}`, `{{REF:types.list}}`, `{{REF:types.claim}}`

noConfigArgs.title: Invalid Usage!
description: Please specify a config value to change!

Accepted Values: `{{REF:types.channel}}`, `{{REF:types.birthdayRole}}`, `{{REF:types.birthdayMasterRole}}`, `{{REF:types.nameFormat}}`, `{{REF:types.timezone}}`, `{{REF:types.useTimezone}}`, `{{REF:types.trustedPreventsMessage}}`, `{{REF:types.trustedPreventsRole}}`, `{{REF:types.requireAllTrustedRoles}}`, `{{REF:types.dateFormat}}`

noMemberAnniversaryRoleArgs.title: Invalid Usage!
description: Please specify a sub command!
Accepted Values: `{{REF:types.add}}`, `{{REF:types.remove}}`, `{{REF:types.clear}}`, `{{REF:types.list}}`

noCustomMessageArgs.title: Invalid Usage!
description: Please specify a sub command!
Accepted Values: `{{REF:types.list}} <value>`, `{{REF:types.add}} <Value>`, `{{REF:types.remove}} <#>`, `{{REF:types.clear}}`, `{{REF:types.time}} <0-23>`, and `{{REF:types.mention}} <Value>`

roleHierarchyError.title: Role Hierarchy Error!
description: The birthday role must be below {{BOT}}'s role.
Additional Note: {{BOT}}'s role must be higher than the users it is assigning the birthday role to.
Example Role Hierarchy:
`{{REF:bot.name}}'s Role`
`Birthday Role`
`Birthday User's Highest Role`
Essentially the bot is unable to give a role to someone with a higher role than them or give a role that is higher than the bot's.

noBirthdaysInServer.description: No one has set their birthday in this server! :(

outOfAttempts.description: You are out of birthday attempts!

noMemberAnniversaryRolesToClaim.description: You aren't eligible for any Member Anniversary Roles!

invalidUsageMemberAnniversaryRoleAdd.title: Invalid Usage!
description: Please provide a year and a role!
Example Usage: `bday memberAnniversaryRole {{REF:types.add}} 5 @Role`

noRole.title: Invalid Usage!
description: Please provide a role!

needReactAndMessageHistoryPerms.title: Missing Permissions!
needReactAndMessageHistoryPerms.description: I need permission to **Add Reactions** and **Read Message History** in this channel!

needManageChannelsAndRolesPerm.title: Missing Permissions!
needManageChannelsAndRolesPerm.description: I need permission to **Manage Channels** and **Manage Roles**!

memberNeedsMessageHistory.description: {{MEMBER}} needs the `READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY` permission in this channel!

description: I don't have permission to send messages in {{CHANNEL}}!
Please allow me to **View Channel**, **Send Messages**, **Embed Links**, and **Add Reactions** in {{CHANNEL}}.

cantSuggest.description: You do not have permission to suggest birthdays for other users!

cantSetBirthdayForBot.description: You can't set a birthday for a bot!

invalidTimezone.title: Time Zone Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: Invalid time zone!
To find your time zone please use the [map time zone picker]({{REF:links.map}})!

invalidTimeZoneAbbreviation.title: Time Zone Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: Invalid time zone! Do not use timezone abbreviations!
To find your time zone please use the [map time zone picker]({{REF:links.map}})!

addMessageInvalidType.title: Add Custom Message
addMessageInvalidType.description: Please specify a message type! Accepted Values: `birthday`, `memberAnniversary`, `serverAnniversary`

removeMessageInvalidType.title: Remove Custom Message
removeMessageInvalidType.description: Please specify a message type! Accepted Values: `birthday`, `memberAnniversary`, `serverAnniversary`, `userSpecificBirthday`, `userSpecificMemberAnniversary`

clearMessageInvalidType.title: Clear Custom Message
clearMessageInvalidType.description: Please specify a message type! Accepted Values: `birthday`, `memberAnniversary`, `serverAnniversary`, `userSpecificBirthday`, `userSpecificMemberAnniversary`

invalidMessageType.title: Custom Message List
invalidMessageType.description: Please specify a message type! Accepted Values: `birthday`, `memberAnniversary`, `serverAnniversary`, `userSpecificBirthday`, `userSpecificMemberAnniversary`

invalidCelebrationType.title: Celebration Test
invalidCelebrationType.description: Please specify a celebration type! Accepted Values: `birthday`, `memberAnniversary`, `serverAnniversary`

invalidChannelType.title: Channel Selection
invalidChannelType.description: Please specify a channel type! Accepted Values: `birthday`, `memberAnniversary`, `serverAnniversary`

birthdayRoleUsedWarning.title: Warning
birthdayRoleUsedWarning.description:
We have detected that __**{{AMOUNT}}**__ user{{S_VALUE}} already have that role!
The Birthday Role should ONLY be the role that users GET on their birthday!

footer.text: The Bot removes the Birthday Role from users whose birthday it isn't!

birthdayRoleUsedError.title: Error
birthdayRoleUsedError.description:
We have detected that __**{{AMOUNT}}**__ users already have that role!
The Birthday Role should ONLY be the role that users GET on their birthday!

footer.text: The Bot removes the Birthday Role from users whose birthday it isn't!

invalidChannelAction.title: Channel Selection
description: Please specify an option!
`{{REF:bot.prefix}} config {{REF:types.channel}} <type> {{REF:types.create}}` - Creates the default channel of that type.
`{{REF:bot.prefix}} config {{REF:types.channel}} <type> {{REF:types.clear}}` - Clears the channel of that type.
`{{REF:bot.prefix}} config {{REF:types.channel}} <type> #channel` - Set the channel of that type.

invalidNameFormat.title: Invalid Name Format
description: Accepted Values
`mention (default)`: **{{MENTION}}**
`username`: **{{USERNAME}}**
`nickname`: **{{NICKNAME}}**

invalidDateFormat.title: Invalid Date Format
description: Accepted Values
`Month/Day`
`Day/Month`

invalidMasterAction.title: Birthday Master Role
description: Please specify an option!
`{{REF:bot.prefix}} config {{REF:types.birthdayMasterRole}} {{REF:types.create}}` - Creates the birthday master role.
`{{REF:bot.prefix}} config {{REF:types.birthdayMasterRole}} {{REF:types.clear}}` - Clears the birthday master role.
`{{REF:bot.prefix}} config {{REF:types.birthdayMasterRole}} @role` - Set the birthday master role.

invalidBirthdayRoleAction.title: Birthday Role
description: Please specify an option!
`{{REF:bot.prefix}} config {{REF:types.birthdayRole}} {{REF:types.create}}` - Creates the default birthday role.
`{{REF:bot.prefix}} config {{REF:types.birthdayRole}} {{REF:types.clear}}` - Clears the birthday role.
`{{REF:bot.prefix}} config {{REF:types.birthdayRole}} @role` - Set the birthday role.

invalidUseTimezoneAction.title: Use Time Zone Setting
description: Please select an option:
`server` - Celebrate birthdays based on the server's timezone.
`user` - Celebrate birthdays based on the user's timezone.

invalidServerTimeZone.title: Default Server Timezone Selection
description: Invalid time zone!
To find your time zone please use the [map time zone picker]({{REF:links.map}})!

invalidServerTimeZoneAbbreviation.title: Default Server Timezone Selection
description: Invalid time zone! Do not use timezone abbreviations!
To find your time zone please use the [map time zone picker]({{REF:links.map}})!

maxFreeTrustedRoles.description: Your server is limited to __**{{FREE_MAX}}**__ trusted role!

footer.text: To have up to {{PAID_MAX}} trusted roles get {{REF:bot.name}} Premium!

anniversaryRoleNoRoleOrPosition.title: Member Anniversary Role Remove
anniversaryRoleNoRoleOrPosition.description: Please specify a year or role to remove!

maxPaidTrustedRoles.description: Your server has reached the maximum trusted roles! (**{{PAID_MAX}}**)

maxPaidMemberAnniversaryRoles.description: Your server has reached the maximum member anniversary roles! (**{{PAID_MAX}}**)

maxFreeCustomMessages.description: Your server has reached the maximum amount of custom {{TYPE}} messages! (**{{FREE_MAX}}**)

footer.text: To have up to {{PAID_MAX}} custom {{TYPE}} messages try {{REF:bot.name}} Premium!

maxPaidCustomMessages.description: Your server has reached the maximum amount of custom {{TYPE}} messages! (**{{PAID_MAX}}**)

maxCustomMessageSize.description: Custom Messages are maxed at {{MAX_SIZE}} characters!

description: Please include the `{{REF:placeHolders.users}}` placeholder somewhere in the message. This indicates where the member names will appear.
Ex: `{{REF:bot.prefix}} message {{REF:types.add}} {{TYPE}} {{EXAMPLE_MESSAGE}}`
Please include the `{{REF:placeHolders.server}}` placeholder somewhere in the message. This indicates where the server name will appear.
Ex: `{{REF:bot.prefix}} message {{REF:types.add}} {{REF:types.serverAnniversary}} {{REF:defaults.serverAnniversaryMessage}}`
Tip: You can also use the `{{REF:placeHolders.year}}` placeholder for the anniversary year.

footer.text: The Bot removes the Birthday Role from anyone whose birthday it isn't!

description: We have detected that __**{{AMOUNT}}**__ users already have that role!

footer.text: The Bot removes the Birthday Role from anyone whose birthday it isn't!

subscriptionAdded.title: {{REF:bot.name}} Premium
subscriptionAdded.description: {{REF:emotes.party}} {[SERVER_NAME}}'s premium has been successfully activated! Enjoy the new features! {{REF:emotes.party}}

footer.text: Consider letting us know how to improve premium!
Consider letting us know how to improve premium!

premiumDisabled.title: {{REF:bot.name}} Premium
premiumDisabled.description: Premium subscriptions are currently disabled. Enjoy premium features for free! Woohoo!

refuseNewTransactions.title: {{REF:bot.name}} Premium
description: New subscriptions are not being accept at this time. Please try again later.
[Join Support Server]({{REF:links.support}})

premiumAlreadyActive.title: {{REF:bot.name}} Premium
description: This server already has an active premium subscription or one that is currently processing.

You cannot purchase premium for this server at this time. If you've recently checked out, you may need for the payment to be processed. If the subscriptions was recently cancelled you may need to wait until the paid time runs out before re-subscribing. As always, feel free to contact support at the link below with any questions.
[Join Support Server]({{REF:links.support}})

subscriptionDMPrompt.title: {{REF:bot.name}} Premium
description: I have private messaged you with a PayPal subscription link!
If you did not receive a message, please make sure you have direct messages enabled for this server (under this servers Privacy Settings) and run this command again.

subscriptionPM.title: {{REF:bot.name}} Premium
subscriptionPM.description: Complete your servers subscription by checking out with PayPal at the link below.

fields.name: Premium Features
value: - Up to **{{BIRTHDAY_MESSAGE_MAX_PAID}}** custom birthday messages *(vs **{{BIRTHDAY_MESSAGE_MAX_FREE}}** free)*
- Up to **{{MEMBER_ANNIVERSARY_MESSAGE_MAX_PAID}}** custom member anniversary messages *(vs **{{MEMBER_ANNIVERSARY_MESSAGE_MAX_FREE}}** free)*
- Up to **{{MEMBER_ANNIVERSARY_MESSAGE_MAX_PAID}}** custom server anniversary messages *(vs **{{MEMBER_ANNIVERSARY_MESSAGE_MAX_FREE}}** free)*
- Access to Member Anniversary Roles! (Up to {{MAX_ANNIVERSARY_ROLES}}!)
- Access to multiple Trusted Roles! (Up to {{MAX_TRUSTED_ROLES}}!)
- Access to user-specific custom birthday messages
- Customize the color **each** birthday message embed

fields.name: Purchase Details
value: Your servers subscription will activate within 5 minutes of checking out with PayPal. You may cancel at any time on your [PayPal Automatic Payments]({{REF:links.autopay}}) page. Any paid time after cancelling will still count as premium service. As always, feel free to contact support at the link below with any questions.

noSubscription.title: {{REF:bot.name}} Premium
noSubscription.description: Subscribe to **{{REF:bot.name}} Premium** to give this server extra features!

fields.name: Premium Features
value: - Up to **{{BIRTHDAY_MESSAGE_MAX_PAID}}** custom birthday messages *(vs **{{BIRTHDAY_MESSAGE_MAX_FREE}}** free)*
- Up to **{{MEMBER_ANNIVERSARY_MESSAGE_MAX_PAID}}** custom member anniversary messages *(vs **{{MEMBER_ANNIVERSARY_MESSAGE_MAX_FREE}}** free)*
- Up to **{{MEMBER_ANNIVERSARY_MESSAGE_MAX_PAID}}** custom server anniversary messages *(vs **{{MEMBER_ANNIVERSARY_MESSAGE_MAX_FREE}}** free)*
- Access to Member Anniversary Roles! (Up to {{MAX_ANNIVERSARY_ROLES}}!)
- Access to multiple Trusted Roles! (Up to {{MAX_TRUSTED_ROLES}}!)
- Access to user-specific custom birthday messages
- Customize the color **each** birthday message embed

fields.name: Purchase Details
value: Type `{{REF:bot.prefix}} subscribe` to purchase a subscription. You will then be direct messaged a PayPal link where you can checkout using your PayPal account or credit card. Your servers subscription will activate within 5 minutes of checking out with PayPal. You may cancel at any time on your [PayPal Automatic Payments]({{REF:links.autopay}}) page. Any paid time after cancelling will still count as premium service. As always, feel free to contact support at the link below with any questions.

fields.name: Purchase Details
value: Type `{{REF:bot.prefix}} subscribe` to purchase a subscription. You will then be direct messaged a PayPal link where you can checkout using your PayPal account or credit card. Your servers subscription will activate within 5 minutes of checking out with PayPal. You may cancel at any time on your [PayPal Automatic Payments]({{REF:links.autopay}}) page. Any paid time after cancelling will still count as premium service. As always, feel free to contact support at the link below with any questions.

command.title: Premium Required!
description: This command requires this server to have premium!

fields.name: Premium Commands
value: Subscribe to **{{REF:bot.name}} Premium** for access to our premium features!

userSpecificMessages.title: {{REF:terms.premiumRequired}}
userSpecificMessages.description: User-specific messages are a premium feature! View information about **{{REF:bot.name}} Premium** using `{{REF:bot.prefix}} premium`!

anniversaryRoles.title: {{REF:terms.premiumRequired}}
anniversaryRoles.description: Member Anniversary Roles are a premium only feature! View information about **{{REF:bot.name}} Premium** using `{{REF:bot.prefix}} premium`!

startupInProcess.description: {{REF:bot.name}} is still starting up. Try again later.

update.title: {{REF:bot.name}} 3.0 Update Notes
description: For full break down of the update visit the [3.0 Update Guide]({{REF:docLinks.recentUpdateDoc}}).
When I started this Birthday Bot update I had no plans for it to be this large.
Fast forward almost **8 months** and it is finally ready to go!
Thank you to everyone for all the support and for 180,000 servers! I never dreamed Birthday Bot would become this big.
I hope you enjoy the update!
If you have any questions **find any bugs**, or have any suggestions **please** [Join Our Support Server]({{REF:links.support}})!

fields.name: Introducing Anniversaries!
value: There are two types of anniversaries: Member and Server.
A Member Anniversary is a yearly celebration of when a user first joined a server.
A Server Anniversary is a yearly celebration of when the discord server was created.
Added Member Anniversary Roles (premium, see below)
Added two new message types (there are now three total) which are sent on an anniversary
- All three message types can have their own separate channel, message time, and mention setting
- Like birthday messages, premium servers can set user specific member anniversary messages.

guildJoin.title: Thank you for using {{REF:bot.name}}!
description: To support the bot and unlock special features use `{{REF:bot.prefix}} premium` in your server.
To view the commands of this bow use `{{REF:bot.prefix}} help`.
To setup the bot run `{{REF:bot.prefix}} setup` in your server.
To set your birthday use `{{REF:bot.prefix}} set`.
View the {{REF:bot.name}} [Documentation]({{REF:links.docs}}) or [FAQ]({{REF:docLinks.faq}}).
For more support join the {{REF:bot.name}} support server [here]({{REF:links.support}})!

support.description: For support join our discord server [here]({{REF:links.support}})!

description: [Kevin Novak](https://github.com/KevinNovak) has created a handy [map time zone picker]({{REF:links.map}})!
Simply click your location on the map and copy the name of the selected time zone. You can then use it in the `{{REF:bot.prefix}} set` command.

general.title: {{REF:bot.name}} General Help
description: {{REF:bot.name}} helps your server celebrate birthdays with automatic birthday roles and announcements.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} premium** - See information about {{REF:bot.name}} Premium.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} subscribe** - Subscribe to {{REF:bot.name}} Premium!
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} help {{REF:types.premium}}** - Help for {{REF:bot.name}} Premium.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} set** - Set your birthday.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} view [type] [user]** - View your information or a user's information.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} next [type]**** - View next birthday(s) in the server.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} list [type] [page/date]**** - View the server birthday list.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} map** - View the time zone map.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} invite** - Invite {{REF:bot.name}} to a server.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} support** - Join the support server.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} docs** - View the documentation.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} faq** - View the frequently asked questions.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} vote** - Vote for {{REF:bot.name}}!
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} purge** - Remove your birthday data.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} help {{REF:types.setup}}** - Help for server setup.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} help {{REF:types.anniversary}}** - Help for the anniversary system.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} help {{REF:types.message}}** - Help for the birthday message settings.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} help {{REF:types.trusted}}** - Help for the trusted system.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} help {{REF:types.blacklist}}** - Help for the birthday blacklist system.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} premium** - See information about {{REF:bot.name}} Premium.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} settings [{{REF:types.message}}/{{REF:types.advanced}}]**** - View server's settings.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} test <type> [user] [anniversary year]**** - Test the birthday event.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} donate** - Support developments by donating!
If you have any question/problems please join our support server [here]({{REF:links.support}}).

setup.title: {{REF:bot.name}} Setup Help - Guild Only
description: **{{REF:bot.prefix}} setup** - Interactive guide for server setup.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} setup {{REF:types.trusted}}** - Interactive guide for trusted system settings setup.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} setup {{REF:types.anniversary}}** - Interactive guide anniversary settings setup.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} config {{REF:types.channel}} <type> <{{REF:types.create}}/{{REF:types.clear}}/#channel> <type>** - Set a channel type.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} config {{REF:types.birthdayRole}} <{{REF:types.create}}/{{REF:types.clear}}/#channel>** - Set the birthday role.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} config {{REF:types.birthdayMasterRole}} <{{REF:types.create}}/{{REF:types.clear}}/#channel>** - Set the birthday master role.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} config {{REF:types.timezone}} <timezone> - Set the default server timezone.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} config {{REF:types.useTimezone}} <{{REF:types.user}}/{{REF:types.server}}> - Set which timezone to use for celebrations.

**{{REF:bot.prefix}} config {{REF:types.nameFormat}} <{{REF:types.mention}}/{{REF:types.nickname}}/{{REF:types.username}}/{{REF:types.tag}}/{{REF:types.default}}>** - Decide how member's names will appear.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} config {{REF:types.dateFormat}} <{{REF:types.monthDay}} or {{REF:types.dayMonth}}>** - Decide how birthdays are detected when member set their birthday.
If you have any question/problems please join our support server [here]({{REF:links.support}}).

message.title: {{REF:bot.name}} Message Help - Guild Only
description: **{{REF:bot.prefix}} message {{REF:types.list}} <type> [page]** - List all messages for that type.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} message {{REF:types.add}} <type> <message>** - Add a message for that type.
- Example Usage: `{{REF:bot.prefix}} message {{REF:types.add}} {{REF:types.memberAnniversary}} <Users> have been in <Server> for <Year>(s)!`
- Placeholder for users: `{{REF:placeHolders.users}}`
- Placeholder for year: `{{REF:placeHolders.year}}`
- Placeholder for server name: `{{REF:placeHolders.server}}`
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} message {{REF:types.remove}} <type> <position>** - Remove a certain message for that type.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} message {{REF:types.clear}} <type>** - Clear all messages for that type.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} message {{REF:types.time}} <type> <0-23>** - Set the message time for that type
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} message {{REF:types.mention}} <type> <role/group>** - Set the message mention setting for that type.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} message {{REF:types.test}} <position> [user count]** - Test a custom message.
If you have any question/problems please join our support server [here]({{REF:links.support}}).

trusted.title: {{REF:bot.name}} Trusted System Help - Guild Only
description: **{{REF:bot.prefix}} setup {{REF:types.trusted}}** - Interactive guide for trusted system settings setup.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} trustedRole {{REF:types.add}} <role>** - Add a trusted role.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} trustedRole {{REF:types.remove}} <position/role>** - Remove a trusted role
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} trustedRole {{REF:types.clear}}** - Clear all trusted roles.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} trustedRole {{REF:types.list}} [page]** - List all trusted roles
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} config {{REF:types.requireAllTrustedRoles}} <T/F>** - If a user should need all the trusted roles.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} config {{REF:types.trustedPreventsMessage}} <T/F>** - If trusted role is required for a birthday message.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} config {{REF:types.trustedPreventsRole}} <T/F>** - If trusted role is required to get the birthday role.
If you have any question/problems please join our support server [here]({{REF:links.support}}).

blacklist.title: {{REF:bot.name}} Blacklist Help - Guild Only
description: **{{REF:bot.prefix}} blacklist {{REF:types.add}} <user>** - Add user to the blacklist.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} blacklist {{REF:types.remove}} <user>** - Remove user from the blacklist.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} blacklist {{REF:types.clear}}** - Clear the birthday blacklist.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} blacklist {{REF:types.list}}** - View all blacklisted users in your server.
If you have any question/problems please join our support server [here]({{REF:links.support}}).

anniversary.title: {{REF:bot.name}} Anniversary Help - Guild Only
description: **{{REF:bot.prefix}} memberAnniversaryRole {{REF:types.add}} <role> <year>** - Add a member anniversary role.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} memberAnniversaryRole {{REF:types.remove}} <role>** - Remove a member anniversary role
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} memberAnniversaryRole {{REF:types.clear}}** - Clear all member anniversary roles.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} memberAnniversaryRole {{REF:types.list}} [page]** - List all member anniversary roles.
If you have any question/problems please join our support server [here]({{REF:links.support}}).

premium.title: {{REF:bot.name}} Premium Help - Guild Only
description: **{{REF:bot.prefix}} premium** - View information about your server's premium.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} message {{REF:types.add}} <type> <message>** - Add a message for that type.
- Example Usage: `{{REF:bot.prefix}} message {{REF:types.add}} {{REF:types.birthday}} Happy Birthday @Stqlth!`
- Placeholder for year: `{{REF:placeHolders.year}}`
- Placeholder for server name: `{{REF:placeHolders.server}}`
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} message {{REF:types.remove}} <type> <@user>** - Remove a user specific custom message.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} message {{REF:types.list}} {{REF:types.userSpecificBirthday}} [page]** - List all user-specific birthday messages.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} message {{REF:types.list}} {{REF:types.userSpecificMemberAnniversary}} [page]** - List all user-specific member anniversary messages.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} memberAnniversaryRole {{REF:types.add}} <role> <year>** - Add a member anniversary role.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} memberAnniversaryRole {{REF:types.remove}} <role>** - Remove a member anniversary role
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} memberAnniversaryRole {{REF:types.clear}}** - Clear all member anniversary roles.
**{{REF:bot.prefix}} memberAnniversaryRole {{REF:types.list}} [page]** - List all member anniversary roles.
If you have any question/problems please join our support server [here]({{REF:links.support}}).

birthday.title: {{REF:terms.birthdayList}} | {{REF:list.pageTitle}}
description: *Birthdays are celebrated on the day (and __time zone__) of the birthday user. To set your birthday use `{{REF:bot.prefix}} set`!*
{{LIST_DATA}}

memberAnniversary.title: {{REF:terms.memberAnniversaryList}} | {{REF:list.pageTitle}}
description: *Member Anniversaries are celebrated on the day of the user's server join date (in the timezone of the __server__).*
{{LIST_DATA}}

birthdayMessageUnLocked.title: {{REF:list.birthdayMessagesTitle}}
description: *A random birthday message is chosen for each birthday message. If there are none, the default will be used. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsCustomMessage}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

birthdayMessageLocked.title: {{REF:list.birthdayMessagesTitle}}
description: *A random birthday message is chosen for each birthday message. If there are none, the default will be used. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsCustomMessage}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

memberAnniversaryMessageUnLocked.title: {{REF:list.memberAnniversaryMessagesTitle}}
description: *A random member anniversary message is chosen for each member anniversary. If there are none, the default will be used. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsCustomMessage}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

memberAnniversaryMessageLocked.title: {{REF:list.memberAnniversaryMessagesTitle}}
description: *A random member anniversary message is chosen for each member anniversary. If there are none, the default will be used. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsCustomMessage}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

serverAnniversaryMessageUnLocked.title: {{REF:list.serverAnniversaryMessagesTitle}}
description: *A random server anniversary message is chosen for each server anniversary. If there are none, the default will be used. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsCustomMessage}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

serverAnniversaryMessageLocked.title: {{REF:list.serverAnniversaryMessagesTitle}}
description: *A random server anniversary message is chosen for each server anniversary. If there are none, the default will be used. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsCustomMessage}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

userSpecificBirthdayMessageUnLocked.title: {{REF:list.userBirthdayMessagesTitle}}
description: *A user-specific birthday message is the birthday message sent to the designated user on their birthday. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsUserSpecificCustomMessage}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

userSpecificBirthdayMessageLocked.title: {{REF:list.userBirthdayMessagesTitle}}
description: *A user-specific birthday message is the birthday message sent to the designated user on their birthday. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsUserSpecificCustomMessage}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

userSpecificMemberAnniversaryMessageUnLo.title: {{REF:list.userMemberAnniversaryMessagesTitle}}
description: *A user-specific member anniversary message is a message sent on that member's member anniversary. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsUserSpecificCustomMessage}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

userSpecificMemberAnniversaryMessageLock.title: {{REF:list.userMemberAnniversaryMessagesTitle}}
description: *A user-specific member anniversary message is a message sent on that member's member anniversary. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsUserSpecificCustomMessage}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

trustedRoleFree.title: {{REF:list.trustedRolesTitle}}
description: *A trusted role decides which roles have their birthday celebrated. Edit how the trusted role(s) work with `{{REF:bot.prefix}} config` [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsTrustedRole}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

trustedRolePaid.title: {{REF:list.trustedRolesTitle}}
description: *A trusted role decides which roles have their birthday celebrated. Edit how the trusted role(s) work with `{{REF:bot.prefix}} config` [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsTrustedRole}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

memberAnniversaryRoleFree.title: {{REF:list.memberAnniversaryRolesTitle}}
description: *A member anniversary role is a given to a user when they hit the given amount of years apart of a discord. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsAnniversaryRole}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

memberAnniversaryRolePaid.title: {{REF:list.memberAnniversaryRolesTitle}}
description: *A member anniversary role is a given to a user when they hit the given amount of years apart of a discord. [(?)]({{REF:docLinks.whatIsAnniversaryRole}})*
{{LIST_DATA}}

blacklist.title: {{REF:terms.blacklistList}} | {{REF:list.pageTitle}}
description: *Users on this list will not have their birthdays celebrated no matter what. Edit this list with `{{REF:bot.prefix}} blacklist <{{REF:types.add}}/{{REF:types.remove}}> <User>`!*
{{LIST_DATA}}

bot.name: Birthday Bot
bot.description: {{REF:bots.name}} helps your server track and celebrate birthdays by automatically celebrating them with numerous fun and extremely customizable features.

footers.tryAgain: Please check above and try again!
footers.whyPremium: Premium helps us support and maintain the bot!
footers.joinSupport: Please join our support server if you have any questions.

prompts.outOfAttempts: **NOTE**: You do not have any birthday attempts left! Clearing your birthday will mean you can no longer set it!

defaults.memberAnniversaryMessage: Congratulations on {{REF:placeHolders.year}} year(s) in the server {{REF:placeHolders.users}}!

list.memberAnniversaryMessageFieldText: The free version of {{REF:bot.name}} can only have up to **{{MAX_FREE}}** custom member anniversary messages. Unlock up to **{{MAX_PAID}}** with `{{REF:bot.prefix}} premium`!
list.serverAnniversaryMessageFieldText: The free version of {{REF:bot.name}} can only have up to **{{MAX_FREE}}** custom server anniversary messages. Unlock up to **{{MAX_PAID}}** with `{{REF:bot.prefix}} premium`!
list.userSpecificMessageFieldText: User-specific messages are a premium only feature. Unlock them with `{{REF:bot.prefix}} premium`!
list.trustedRoleFieldText: The free version of {{REF:bot.name}} can only have up to **{{MAX_FREE}}** trusted roles. Unlock up to **{{MAX_PAID}}** with `{{REF:bot.prefix}} premium`!

conditionals.needColorForPremium: Customize the message color with `{{REF:bot.prefix}} premium`!
